title: Flight Simulator 2020 -  How to - Fix the pink textures and graphic artifacts
description:
In this video we will look at how you can fix the pink textures and graphic artifacts you might have seen in Flight Simulator. We will start with locating the packages folder and continue with the steps you can take to resolve the issue.

0:00 intro
0:10 locating the packages folder
2:25 removing the community folder
3:09 cleaning up the "default" scenery
4:11 repair/uninstall Flight Simulator
